SimEntity.author: pjsulliv
SimEntity.name: RandomVariatePlotter
SimEntity.Comment: This simple event graph can be used to generate histograms based on diskit.random distributions. This is just an example implementation to check the distribution of random variates being created

Parameter.name: histogram
Parameter.Comment: Creates a histogram based on the distribution that is provided

StateVariable.name: histogramWindow
StateVariable.Comment: The local copy of the histogram/distribution

Event.name: PlotHistogram
Event.Comment: Calls the drawHistogram method of diskit.random.Histogram and plots a histogram based on the distribution parameters provided
